name: Comments
author: Thomas Maier

sections.description:
Fine tune comments in WordPress.

You can find the settings page under Comments > Settings in the dashboard.

Features

  • remove comments from post type: posts, pages, attachments and other public custom post types
  • [more coming soon]

I am open to your suggestions for more features here or in the github repository
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Visit the settings page under Comments > Settings to customize the form
